title: 乌克兰军方在顿涅茨克地区，伊万尼维克（Ivanivske），donet的安德里维卡（Andriyivka）附近与俄罗斯军队进行了49次战斗。
content: Ukrainian military had 49 combat engagements with Russian forces near Terny of Donetsk region, Ivanivske, Andriyivka of Donetsk region, Berdychi, Semenivka and Nevelske of Donetsk region, Heorhiyivka, Novomykhaylivka, Staromayorske of Donetsk region and Robotyne of Zaporizhzhia region, - General Staff of Armed 乌克兰的部队在晚上的报告中说
author: Live UA Map
